item.title: Eric add a quote by Aberjhani
item.description: "Your pain is a school unto itself–– and your joy a lovely temple." -- Aberjhani

item.title: Eric add a quote by Carson McCullers
item.description: "We all of us somehow caught. We born this way or that way and we don't know why. But we caught any how. I was born Berenice. You Born Franky. John Henry born John Henry. And maybe we wants to widen and bust free. But no matter what we do we still caught. Me is me and you is you and he is he. We each one of us somehow caught all by ourself. I'm caught worse than you is. Because I'm Black, because I'm colored." -- Carson McCullers
